title: From John O'Groats to Land's End; Or, 1372 miles on foot; A book of days and chronicle of adventures by two pedestrians on tour
author: Naylor, John Anderton
snippet: The coach, the last stage-coach thatever ran on that road, was drawn in ordinary weather by three horses,which were changed every seven or eight miles, the "Cross Keys" atCanonbie being one of the stopping-places.
